messages.subject: 2010 San Francisco To-Ken Taikai
messages.msgSnippet: For those thinking of coming to this years To-ken Taikai, The shinsa slots for Friday are full up, Saturday is going fast - if you are thinking of submitting
messages.messageBody:
For those thinking of coming to this years To-ken Taikai,
The shinsa slots for Friday are full up, Saturday is going fast - if
you are thinking of submitting swords for authentication, now is the
time to get your registrations in.

We have updated the website with a Team Bio page:

http://www.toryu-mon.com/Toryu-Mon/NTHK_Team.html

Please check it out and feel free to ask us any questions. For info on
the Taikai, the largest Japanese Sword Show and Sale outside of Japan,
visit;

http://www.ncjsc.org/

-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
